Package orderManagment

Class OrderProcessManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • orderManagment.OrderProcessManager
  • public class OrderProcessManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Create a order from a cart, manage the order process, creation to full payment

      • reset

        public void reset()

      • placeOrder

        public Order placeOrder​(Cart cart,
                        int orderNumber,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String id)
        Get a cart object, username and order number. Create new order with the given number and get the items and other order details from the cart object. for each item, calculate the item price and add it to the total order price. return the newly created order object aand save the order for future actions.
        Parameters:
        cart - the cart we want to place as order
        orderNumber - the order number
        username - the user who place the order
        Returns:

      • payForOrder

        public boolean payForOrder​(java.lang.String cardInfo)
        pay for the activeOrder, return true if the payment succeed, use the given card info
        Parameters:
        cardInfo -
        Returns:
        true if the payment succeed

      • saveOrderToDB

        public boolean saveOrderToDB()
        save the active order to the database, including items in order and delivery details(if exists)
        Returns:
        true on success
